Main.content: I need to tell you what's really going on here.
About this island. About these tasks.
I need to ask - who are you?
Are you the one walking around?
Or is that merely an empty husk that you are controlling?
And that weapon you used, is it not an extension of you?
If not then what about your arms that hold that weapon?
If you separate the arm from the body, then is the arm still you?
Imagine separating more and more parts of the body.
At what point can we stop and conclude that the remainder is the true "you"?
So I'll let you think about that and take my leave.......
